item.title: 法国物价回升乏力，欧洲央行对该地区发出的信号喜忧参半
item.description: 在德国通胀压力加大的情况下，法国 7 月份的通胀加速度低于预期，为欧洲中央银行官员提供了喜忧参半的证据。【原文：French inflation accelerated less than expected in July, offering mixed evidence for European Central Bank officials amid stronger pressures in Germany.】

item.title: 科威特顶级伊斯兰银行着眼于建立 500 亿美元贷款机构的交易
item.description: 科威特最大的两家伊斯兰贷款机构正在考虑合并，合并后将形成一家资产超过 500 亿美元的地区银行巨头。【原文：Two of Kuwait’s largest Islamic lenders are considering a merger that would create a regional banking behemoth with more than $50 billion in assets.】

item.title: 勒梅尔称法国将推进预算进程
item.description: 布鲁诺-勒梅尔（Bruno Le Maire）说，法国看守政府正在推进必要的步骤，以确保议会在秋季有预算法案可供表决。【原文：France’s caretaker government is pushing ahead with the steps needed to ensure parliament will have budget bills to vote on in the Fall, Bruno Le Maire said.】

item.title: 受欧佩克+限制影响，沙特经济连续第四个季度萎缩
item.description: 由于欧佩克+减产继续拖累世界头号石油出口国的经济，沙特阿拉伯的国内生产总值连续第四个季度出现小幅萎缩。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s gross domestic product contracted slightly for the fourth quarter in a row as OPEC+ production cuts continued to weigh on the economy of the world’s top oil exporter.】

item.title: 阿迪达斯在美国的批发业务增长更快，业绩有所改善
item.description: 阿迪达斯公司（Adidas AG）报告称，批发收入反弹，北美市场恢复增长（Yeezy 运动鞋销售除外），该品牌希望在多年危机后增加利润。【原文：Adidas AG reported a rebound in wholesale revenue and a return to growth in North America, when Yeezy sneaker sales were excluded, as the brand looks to increase profits after years of crisis.】

item.title: 台湾金管会称外国投资者出售股票只是 "短期行为
item.description: 台湾最高金融监管机构表示，近期海外投资者抛售股票是 "短期现象"，并不代表看跌观点，近年来外资持股一直呈上升趋势。【原文：Taiwan’s top financial regulator said recent sales of stocks by overseas investors are a “short-term phenomenon” that don’t represent a bearish view, with foreign holdings having been on an upward trend in recent years.】

item.title: 日本央行调查决策前阻止交易的网站崩溃事件
item.description: 日本央行正在调查其网站出现的一个问题，该问题导致一些市场参与者无法访问央行周三发布的备受关注的加息公告。【原文：The Bank of Japan is investigating an issue with its website that prevented some market participants from accessing the central bank’s closely watched rate-hike announcement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：央行会议纷至沓来，股市势必上涨
item.description: 2024年7月29日星期一，行人经过英国伦敦金融城的英格兰银行（BOE）。如果英国央行在本周晚些时候选择降息，英镑大幅回落的可能性正在增加。【原文：Pedestrians pass by the Bank of England (BOE) in the City of London, UK, on Monday, July 29, 2024. The chances of a sharp retreat in the British pound are growing if the Bank of England opts to lower interest rates later this week.】

item.title: 亚洲需求强劲，达能销售额超预期
item.description: 达能集团第二季度的收入增长超过预期，主要得益于亚洲地区的经济复苏，以及因生活成本压力而放弃该品牌的购物者的回流。【原文：Danone SA’s revenue rose more than expected in the second quarter, driven by a recovery in the Asia region and the return of shoppers who’d turned from the brand amid cost-of-living pressures.】

item.title: 分析师称日本央行结果对日元利弊参半，焦点转向美联储
item.description: 分析师和策略师们表示，日本央行提高利率并削减债券购买量后，日元汇率大幅波动，因为会议结果并未真正明确央行的长期发展方向。【原文：The yen whipsawed after the Bank of Japan raised interest rates and cut bond purchases as the outcome of the meeting didn’t really clarify the central bank’s long-term path, analysts and strategists said.】

item.title: 股市走强抵消了法郎涨幅，瑞士国家银行公布半年盈利报告
item.description: 由于股票和黄金价格上涨，瑞士国家银行实现了六个月的稳健盈利，补充了其资本基础，并使人们对该央行能够恢复对政府的支付抱有希望。【原文：The Swiss National Bank made a solid six-month profit on rising equities and gold prices, replenishing its capital base and keeping hopes alive that the central bank will be able resume payouts to the government.】

item.title: 费森尤斯在西班牙医院服务和成本削减方面超越预期
item.description: 费森尤斯公司（Fresenius SE）公布的收益超出预期，原因是西班牙的医院服务表现强劲，而且公司注重削减成本。【原文：Fresenius SE posted earnings that beat estimates amid strong performance for hospital services in Spain and a focus on cost cuts.】

item.title: 日本央行提高政策利率后日元仍下跌，收益率差距依然存在
item.description: 即使在日本央行提高利率之后，日元仍然下跌，因为投资者权衡了这个亚洲国家与其他主要经济体之间仍然存在的巨大收益率差异。【原文：The yen dropped even after the Bank of Japan raised interest rates as investors weighed what remains a wide yield differential between the Asian nation and other major economies.】

item.title: 刺激经济呼声高涨，中国股市迎来四月以来最佳交易日
item.description: 中国股市跳涨，在岸基准股指有望创下三个多月来的最佳表现，原因是市场对中国政府扶持陷入困境的经济的预期日益高涨。【原文：Chinese stocks jumped, with the onshore benchmark gauge poised for its best day in over three months, as anticipation grew for Beijing to bolster its struggling economy.】

item.title: 从根本上解决英国的住房危机：一个新的离岸城市
item.description:

The new government’s promise to build 1.5 million homes in the next five years will only start to ease the situation. How about developing a new London next to the one already there?

item.description:

】

item.title: 日本央行比美联储提前数小时上调关键利率
item.description: 日本央行提高了基准利率，并公布了将债券购买量减半的计划，这些行动彰显了其政策正常化的决心。【原文：The Bank of Japan raised its benchmark interest rate and unveiled plans to halve its bond purchases in actions that underscore its determination to normalize policy.】

item.title: 澳元承压，股市因澳大利亚央行利率前景转变而获得提振
item.description: 分析师表示，澳元将继续下滑，而股市可能仍会受到支撑，因为核心通胀数据低于预期，刺激了对该国央行今年降息的押注。【原文：The Australian dollar is set to extend its slide while stocks may remain supported as softer-than-expected core inflation print spurred bets for the nation’s central bank to cut interest-rates this year, analysts said.】

item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 联邦银行超越必和必拓，成为澳大利亚最大企业
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）一举超越全球最大的矿业公司必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd.），成为澳大利亚最有价值的公司。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia has shot past the world’s biggest miner BHP Group Ltd. and is now the country’s most valuable company.】

item.title: 日本央行将在美联储前数小时决定利率
item.description: 2024年6月14日星期五，日本东京，日本央行行长上田一夫在央行总部举行的新闻发布会上。日本央行让投资者等到7月份的会议上再了解缩减购债规模的细节，这引发日元再度走软，并推低了加息押注。摄影师：Kiyoshi Ota/Bloomberg【原文：Kazuo Ueda, governor of the Bank of Japan (BOJ), during a news conference at the central bank's headquarters in Tokyo, Japan, on Friday, June 14, 2024. The Bank of Japan is making investors wait until its July meeting for details on its paring of bond buying, sparking renewed weakness in the yen and a pushing back of bets on an interest rate hike. Photographer: Kiyoshi Ota/Bloomberg】

item.title: 中国任命新市场副主席接替改革派方星海
item.description: 中国任命了一位新官员担任市场监管机构副主任，接替长期倡导改革和开放资本市场的方星海。【原文：China has appointed a new official as deputy chief at its markets regulator to replace Fang Xinghai, a long-time advocate for reform and open capital markets.】

item.title: 中国人民银行即将出售债券，中国地区银行面临债券逆转风险
item.description: 在今年史无前例的债券大涨引发央行发出一系列警告之后，中国的地区贷款机构在中国 4.3 万亿美元的主权债务市场上正面临着越来越大的风险。【原文：China’s regional lenders are facing growing risks in the nation’s $4.3 trillion sovereign debt market after an unprecedented bond rally this year prompted a slew of warnings from the central bank.】

item.title: 出口繁荣、美联储转向，林吉特将加速好转
item.description: 得益于强劲的经济增长和对美联储即将降息的预期，马来西亚林吉特的反弹步伐正在加快。【原文：The Malaysian ringgit’s rebound is gathering pace, thanks to stronger growth and expectations of an impending interest rate cut by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 末日博士 "努里埃尔-鲁比尼希望推出首只 ETF
item.description: 经济学家努里埃尔-鲁比尼（Nouriel Roubini）因在 2008 年金融危机前发出灾难警告而赢得了 "末日博士 "的称号，他正期待着成为最新一位在 9.4 万亿美元的 ETF 领域大显身手的华尔街资深人士。【原文：Economist Nouriel Roubini, who earned the “Dr. Doom” moniker for his warnings of disaster ahead of the 2008 financial crisis, is looking to become the latest high-profile Wall Street veteran to make their mark in the $9.4 trillion ETF universe.】

item.title: 新加坡镍丑闻清算人寻求收回 8.55 亿新元：ST
item.description: 据《海峡时报》（Straits Times）报道，涉嫌镍矿诈骗犯吴裕智（Ng Yu Zhi）旗下三家公司的清算人正在寻求法院命令，以从吴裕智及其他三人手中追回约 8.55 亿新元（约合 6.37 亿美元）。【原文：The liquidators of alleged nickel fraudster Ng Yu Zhi’s three companies are seeking a court order to recover about S$855 million ($637 million) from Ng and three others, the Straits Times reported.】

item.title: 中国企业盈利复苏蹒跚，考验投资者信心
item.description: 对于中国股票投资者来说，当前的财报季正在成为又一个令人失望的季节，削弱了低迷市场出现转机的可能性。【原文：The current earnings season is shaping up to be another letdown for Chinese stock investors, eroding the case for a turnaround in the slumping market.】
